subject: Neutron Beam Radiotherapy
html_content:
Investigational and Not Medically Necessary:

Neutron beam radiotherapy is considered investigational and not medically necessary for all indications.
content:
Investigational and Not Medically Necessary:
Neutron beam radiotherapy is considered investigational and not medically necessary for all indications.

criteria.description: Neutron beam radiotherapy is considered investigational and not medically necessary for all indications.

subject: Electrophysiology-Guided Noninvasive Stereotactic Cardiac Radioablation
html_content:
Investigational and Not Medically Necessary:

The use of electrophysiology-guided noninvasive stereotactic cardiac radioablation is considered investigational and not medically necessary as a treatment modality for all indications, including drug and ablation refractory ventricular tachycardia and cardiomyopathy related to premature ventricular contractions.
content:
Investigational and Not Medically Necessary:
The use of electrophysiology-guided noninvasive stereotactic cardiac radioablation is considered investigational and not medically necessary as a treatment modality for all indications, including drug and ablation refractory ventricular tachycardia and cardiomyopathy related to premature ventricular contractions.
